XPath Generator

XPath Generator is a powerful tool for web developers and testers to quickly create XPath expressions. This lightweight Chrome extension allows users to inspect elements on web pages and generate XPath expressions based on attributes such as id, text, class, and more. Simplify your web scraping and automation tasks with precise XPath queries generated instantly.

Key Features:

Generate XPath expressions for HTML elements.
Support for attributes like id, text, class, and more.
Easy-to-use interface integrated directly into Chrome's Developer Tools.
Improve efficiency in web testing and automation workflows.
How to Use:

Inspect an element on any web page.
Select an attribute type (id, text, class, etc.) from the dropdown.
Click "Generate" to instantly get the XPath expression.
Copy and use the XPath in your automation scripts or testing tools.
XPath Generator simplifies XPath creation, making web development and testing more efficient. Download now and streamline your XPath workflow today!
